ignore.description: Ignore files, so that the linter doesn't process them.
ignore.title: Ignore

description: yamllint uses a set of rules to check source files for problems.

locale.description: This is passed to Python’s locale.setlocale.
locale.title: Locale

forbid.description: Used to forbid the use of flow mappings which are denoted by surrounding braces ({ and }).
forbid.title: Forbid

max-spaces-inside.description: Defines the maximal number of spaces allowed inside braces.
max-spaces-inside.title: Max Spaces Inside

max-spaces-inside-empty.description: Defines the maximal number of spaces allowed inside empty braces.
max-spaces-inside-empty.title: Max Spaces Inside Empty

min-spaces-inside.description: Defines the minimal number of spaces required inside braces.
min-spaces-inside.title: Minimum Spaces Inside

min-spaces-inside-empty.description: Defines the minimal number of spaces required inside empty braces.
min-spaces-inside-empty.title: Minimum Spaces Inside Empty

braces.description: Use this rule to control the use of flow mappings or number of spaces inside braces ({ and }).
braces.title: Braces

forbid.description: Used to forbid the use of flow sequences which are denoted by surrounding brackets ([ and ]).
forbid.title: Forbid

max-spaces-inside.description: Defines the maximal number of spaces allowed inside brackets.
max-spaces-inside.title: Max Spaces Inside

max-spaces-inside-empty.description: Defines the maximal number of spaces allowed inside empty brackets.
max-spaces-inside-empty.title: Max Spaces Inside Empty

min-spaces-inside.description: Defines the minimal number of spaces required inside brackets.
min-spaces-inside.title: Minimum Spaces Inside

min-spaces-inside-empty.description: Defines the minimal number of spaces required inside empty brackets.
min-spaces-inside-empty.title: Minimum Spaces Inside Empty

brackets.description: Use this rule to control the use of flow sequences or the number of spaces inside brackets ([ and ]).
brackets.title: Brackets

max-spaces-after.description: Defines the maximal number of spaces allowed after colons (use -1 to disable).
max-spaces-after.title: Max Spaces After

max-spaces-before.description: Defines the maximal number of spaces allowed before colons (use -1 to disable).
max-spaces-before.title: Max Spaces Before

colons.description: Use this rule to control the number of spaces before and after colons (:).
colons.title: Colons

max-spaces-after.description: Defines the maximal number of spaces allowed after commas (use -1 to disable).
max-spaces-after.title: Max Spaces After

max-spaces-before.description: Defines the maximal number of spaces allowed before commas (use -1 to disable).
max-spaces-before.title: Max Spaces Before

min-spaces-after.description: Defines the minimal number of spaces required after commas.
min-spaces-after.title: Minimum Spaces After

commas.description: Use this rule to control the number of spaces before and after commas (,).
commas.title: Commas

ignore-shebangs.description: Ignore a shebang at the beginning of the file when require-starting-space is set.
ignore-shebangs.title: Ignore Shebangs

min-spaces-from-content.description: Used to visually separate inline comments from content.
min-spaces-from-content.title: Minimum Spaces from Content

require-starting-space.description: Require a space character right after the #.
require-starting-space.title: Require Starting Space

comments.description: Use this rule to control the position and formatting of comments.
comments.title: Comments

comments-indentation.description: Use this rule to force comments to be indented like content.
comments-indentation.title: Comments Indentation

present.description: True when the document end marker is required, or to false when it is forbidden.
present.title: Present

document-end.description: Use this rule to require or forbid the use of document end marker (...).
document-end.title: Document End

present.description: True when the document start marker is required, or to false when it is forbidden.
present.title: Present

document-start.description: Use this rule to require or forbid the use of document start marker (---).
document-start.title: Document Start

max.description: Defines the maximal number of empty lines allowed in the document.
max.title: Max

max-start.description: Defines the maximal number of empty lines allowed at the beginning of the file.
max-start.title: Max Start

empty-lines.description: Use this rule to set a maximal number of allowed consecutive blank lines.
empty-lines.title: Empty Lines

forbid-in-block-mappings.description: Prevent empty values in block mappings.
forbid-in-block-mappings.title: Forbid in Block Mappings

forbid-in-flow-mappings.description: Prevent empty values in flow mappings.
forbid-in-flow-mappings.title: Forbid in Flow Mappings

empty-values.description: Use this rule to prevent nodes with empty content, that implicitly result in null values.
empty-values.title: Empty Values

max-spaces-after.description: Defines the maximal number of spaces allowed after hyphens.
max-spaces-after.title: Max Spaces After

hyphens.description: Use this rule to control the number of spaces after hyphens (-).
hyphens.title: Hyphens

check-multi-line-strings.description: Defines whether to lint indentation in multi-line strings.
check-multi-line-strings.title: Check Multi Line Strings

indent-sequences.description: Defines whether block sequences should be indented or not (when in a mapping, this indentation is not mandatory – some people perceive the - as part of the indentation).
indent-sequences.title: Indent Sequences

spaces.description: Defines the indentation width, in spaces.
spaces.title: Spaces

indentation.description: Use this rule to control the indentation.
indentation.title: Indentation

key-duplicates.description: Use this rule to prevent multiple entries with the same key in mappings.
key-duplicates.title: Key Duplicates

key-ordering.description: Use this rule to enforce alphabetical ordering of keys in mappings.
key-ordering.title: Key Ordering

allow-non-breakable-inline-mappings.description: Implies allow-non-breakable-words and extends it to also allow non-breakable words in inline mappings.
allow-non-breakable-inline-mappings.title: Allow Non-Breakable Inline Mappings

allow-non-breakable-words.description: Used to allow non breakable words (without spaces inside) to overflow the limit.
allow-non-breakable-words.title: Allow Non-Breakable Words

max.description: Defines the maximal (inclusive) length of lines.
max.title: Max

line-length.description: Use this rule to set a limit to lines length.
line-length.title: Line Length

new-line-at-end-of-file.description:
Use this rule to require a new line character (
) at the end of files.
new-line-at-end-of-file.title: New Line at End of File

type.title: Type

new-lines.description: Use this rule to force the type of new line characters.
new-lines.title: New Lines

octal-values.description: Use this rule to prevent values with octal numbers.
octal-values.title: Octal Values

extra-allowed.description: List of PCRE regexes to allow quoted string values, even if required: only-when-needed is set.
extra-allowed.title: Extra Allowed

extra-required.description: List of PCRE regexes to force string values to be quoted, if they match any regex.
extra-required.title: Extra Required

required.description: Defines whether using quotes in string values is required.
required.title: Required

quoted-strings.description: Use this rule to forbid any string values that are not quoted, or to prevent quoted strings without needing it.
quoted-strings.title: Quoted Strings

trailing-spaces.description: Use this rule to forbid trailing spaces at the end of lines.
trailing-spaces.title: Tailing Spaces

allowed-values.description: Defines the list of truthy values which will be ignored during linting.
allowed-values.title: Allowed Values

check-keys.description: Disables verification for keys in mappings.
check-keys.title: Check Keys

truthy.description: Use this rule to forbid non-explictly typed truthy values other than allowed ones (by default: true and false), for example YES or off.
truthy.title: Truthy

title: yamllint
